Package io.netty.handler.ssl

Class OpenSslEngine

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.net.ssl.SSLEngine
      • io.netty.handler.ssl.ReferenceCountedOpenSslEngine
        • io.netty.handler.ssl.OpenSslEngine
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ReferenceCounted
    public final class OpenSslEngine
extends ReferenceCountedOpenSslEngine
    Implements a SSLEngine using OpenSSL BIO abstractions.

    This class will use a finalizer to ensure native resources are automatically cleaned up. To avoid finalizers and manually release the native memory see ReferenceCountedOpenSslEngine.
